Name: Specialty Drinks
Description: Maqi is trying to contact you, and it appears to be related to the Pioneer Association's ambitious project, "Second Coming of Solaris"...
QuestDesc: Maqi is trying to contact you, and it appears to be related to the Pioneer Association's ambitious project, "Second Coming of Solaris"...

Dialogues.Speaker: Maqi
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Let me explain our job today.

Dialogues.Speaker: Maqi
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: In the opening chapter, our protagonist paid a visit to a city called Tiancheng.

Dialogues.Speaker: Maqi
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: According to the book, "the cries of peddlers fill the market... a bewildering array of goods lines the shelves of every shop..."

Dialogues.Speaker: Maqi
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: "We had a taste of a local drink served by the hotel. I was caught by total relief though my tongue stung a bit from that bitterness..."

Dialogues.Speaker: Maqi
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: "Even on such foreign land, we feel safe and sound... We stayed there for three days to restore our strengths before we reluctantly said goodbye to this city."

Dialogues.Speaker: Maqi
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: This Tiancheng here is so much alike to Jinzhou.

Options.PlotLineKey: I can think of nothing else.
You can even see it as a doppelganger.

Dialogues.Speaker: Maqi
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Anyway, the dev team wants an item that embodies this prosperity of Tiancheng, which is also a significant town scene in the game.

Dialogues.Speaker: Maqi
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Well, that local drink will suffice.

Dialogues.Speaker: Maqi
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: If you happen to come across some samples, feel free to drop by.

Dialogues.Speaker: Maqi
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Enjoying a cup of tea over chitchats in an inn... Seeing the steam of hot tea does make it more vivid.

Dialogues.Speaker: Maqi
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: This would be what our dev team needs. I even can picture the lively Tiancheng right now.

Dialogues.Speaker: Speaker_undefined
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Some time passed while Maqi was away to hand over the item...

Dialogues.Speaker: Maqi
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Thank you. That wraps up today's work!

Dialogues.Speaker: Maqi
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: See you tomorrow, {PlayerName}.

Dialogues.Speaker: Maqi
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Drinks that will prevail on foreign taste buds... Maybe I should do a street interview with those visitors?

Dialogues.Speaker: Maqi
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: The Pioneer Merchandises have been Ganxue's staple. Many visitors bring one of those back as a gift.

Dialogues.Speaker: Maqi
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: That would be a good idea that you ask Ganxue about their comments on Jinzhou.

Dialogues.Speaker: Ganxue
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Among all the drinks in Jinzhou, I like tea the most.

Dialogues.Speaker: Ganxue
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: ...which is also the perfect match for what's in Second Coming of Solaris. Its taste is bitter but persistent on your tongue.

Dialogues.Speaker: Ganxue
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Tea is also the most popular seller here in my shop.

Options.PlotLineKey: Could I have one pack of tea?

Dialogues.Speaker: Ganxue
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: By all means. That's also our greeting to visitors of Jinzhou.

Dialogues.Speaker: Ganxue
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Here. Remember to boil it with spring water. That makes the tea even better!

Dialogues.Speaker: Ganxue
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: We look forward to meeting you again. Goodbye.

Dialogues.Speaker: Ganxue
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Among all the drinks in Jinzhou, I like tea the most.

Dialogues.PlotLineKey: ...which is also the perfect match for what's in Second Coming of Solaris. Its taste is bitter but persistent on your tongue.

Dialogues.Speaker: Ganxue
